translations.name: The New Testament for Everyone
translations.description: Broken up into easy-to read, bite-sized chunks and illustrated throughout with clear, helpful maps, this is a new rendering of ancient wisdom that can be read like a novel, studied in sections or used as an aid to daily devotion.
